less: Press Enter to view more, or any other key to exit!({{$lines}} lines remaining)
persist_err:
This is an error in the application manifest.
The function (persist) must specify the parameter -dir or -file.
The function (persist) has been terminated, and the built-in option(persist) in Scoop is not affected (if it's configured)
need_close:
{{$app_name}} needs to be manually closed to uninstall
Please confirm that you have closed it and press Enter to continue
